00392                        unsigned long &len,          // returned len

00395 #endif
00396

00635 class AGENTPP_DECL Pdux: public NS_SNMP Pdu {
00636 public:
00637         Pdux(): Pdu() { }
00638         Pdux(NS_SNMP Vb* pvbs, const int pvb_count): Pdu(pvbs, pvb_count) { }
00639         Pdux(const Pdu& pdu): Pdu(pdu) { }
00640         Pdux(const Pdux& pdu): Pdu(pdu) { }
00641 
00642         virtual ~Pdux() { }
00643 
00650         void    set_error_status(int err)           { error_status = err; }
00651 
00658         void    set_error_index (int index)         { error_index  = index;}
00665         void    set_request_id(unsigned long reqid) { request_id   = reqid; }
00666 
00667         NS_SNMP Vb&     operator[](int i)           { return *vbs[i]; }
00668 
00669 
00673         void    clear();
00674 
00678         void    clear_error() { set_error_status(0); set_error_index(0); }
00679 
00680         // const redefinitions of originals: 
00681         Pdux&   operator+=(const NS_SNMP Vb&);
00682 
00683         int     get_vblist(Vbx*, const int) const; 
00684 
00691         unsigned long get_request_id() const        { return request_id; } 
00692 
00693         int     get_error_status() const { return error_status; }
00694         int     get_error_index() const  { return error_index; }
00695 
00702         virtual Pdux*   clone() const { return new Pdux(*this); }
00703 };

00719 class AGENTPP_DECL Snmpx: public NS_SNMP Snmp {
00720 public:
00730         Snmpx (int &status , u_short port): Snmp(status, port) {};
00731 
00732 #ifdef SNMP_PP_WITH_UDPADDR
00733 
00743         Snmpx(int& status, const NS_SNMP UdpAddress& addr): Snmp(status, addr) { }
00744 #endif
00745 
00746 #ifdef _SNMPv3          
00747 
00764         int receive(struct timeval*, Pdux&, NS_SNMP UTarget&);
00765 #else
00766 
00784         int receive(struct timeval*, Pdux&, NS_SNMP UdpAddress&, 
00785                     NS_SNMP snmp_version&, NS_SNMP OctetStr&);
00786 #endif
00787 #ifdef _SNMPv3
00788 
00804         int send (Pdux, NS_SNMP SnmpTarget*);
00805 #else
00806 
00821         int send (Pdux, NS_SNMP UdpAddress, NS_SNMP snmp_version, NS_SNMP OctetStr);
00822 #endif
00823 
00829         u_short get_port();
00830 
00841 #ifdef WIN32
00842         unsigned long   get_session_fds() { return iv_snmp_session; }
00843 #else
00844         SNMPHANDLE      get_session_fds() { return iv_snmp_session; }
00845 #endif
00846 
00847 
00848 protected:
00849         unsigned long ProcessizedReqId(unsigned short);
00850         unsigned long MyMakeReqId();
00851         
00852         int snmp_engine( NS_SNMP Pdu &,          // pdu to use
00853                          long int,       // # of non repititions
00854                          long int,       // # of max repititions
00855                          NS_SNMP SnmpTarget&,    // from this target
00856                          const NS_SNMP snmp_callback cb, 
00857                          const void * cbd);
00858 };

00860 /*--------------------------- class Opaque -----------------------------*/
00861 
00872 class AGENTPP_DECL Opaque: public NS_SNMP OctetStr 
00873 {
00874  public:
00875   // constructor using no arguments
00876   Opaque();
00877 
00878   // constructor using a  string
00879   Opaque( const char * string);
00880 
00881   // constructor using an unsigned char *
00882   Opaque( const unsigned char * string, unsigned long int size);
00883 
00884   // constructor using another octet object
00885   Opaque( const OctetStr &octet);
00886 
00887   Opaque( const Opaque& opaque);
00888 
00889   virtual SnmpSyntax* clone() const { return new Opaque(*this); }
00890 
00891   virtual NS_SNMP SmiUINT32 get_syntax() const { return sNMP_SYNTAX_OPAQUE; };
00892 };
